Monitoring DNS Cache with VirusTotal – Windows VM Threat Watch

September 05, 2025 | project cybersecurity, research, tutorial, analysis, malware, forensics, network-security, incident-response

A lightweight monitoring tool that periodically scans a Windows workstation's DNS cache, extracts domains/IPs, checks them against VirusTotal, and alerts/logs on suspicious findings.
